body:
Well this time it is actually goodbye to Avicus, and I may never see it again. I will be going to France for 2 years without a computer and without a phone so I won't be able to communicate at all with any of you, so I thought that it would be nice to just say thanks for everything and it was really fun to know lots of you.

If you want to follow what I will be doing in France add me on skype and I will send you the email that you can reach me at! My current skype is smashing_bro

Thanks,
Riley
